TextView.SetFontStyle: The Best Show On WFMU is now The Best Podcast On WFMU! Join Tom Scharpling as he journeys through the treacherous and hi-larious world of open phones, bizarre fake guests, and even more disturbing real guests. The podcast is all of the Mirth and Mayhem, but none of the Music!
I just said it in the title.

GotoURL.b: The wonderful convergence of all things cool and funny

TextView.SetFontStyle: Where do Tim Heidecker, Yo La Tengo, Ted Leo, Conan O’Brien, and Robert Pollard get together for dinner each Tuesday night? I don’t know the answer to that question. Upon whom was the original Fonzie based? Pat Sajak’s brother…salt of the earth? ... More

If you listened to this show for a few minutes, you might think it was a typical, mildly rambling community radio talk show. Our genial host Tom Scharpling gives pleasant counsel to the young people and the sort of crackpots who'd call in to a free... More
